articles.title: Explained: Why is single-use plastic being banned in India from July 1?
articles.description: If not recycled, plastic can take a thousand years to decompose, according to UN Environment, the United Nations Environment Programme. At landfills, it disintegrates into small fragments and leaches carcinogenic metals into groundwater.
